title: How do I record calls?
content:
I checked Google's documentation on requirements and I meet at least 2 of 3. The only one I'm not sure of is if I'm in a country or region that allows it, and on a carrier who does.

I'm on an updated Google Pixel 3a XL, using Verizon, in Houston, TX. I see no permissions that mention call recording on the native phone app. 

Am I missing something?
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
